Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player of the game which makes moves and controls his game Dashboard

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(Game game, String name, TowerColor towerColor)
      Class Constructor
      Parameters:
      game - the game in which the player is playing
      name - the name of the player, used to find two equal players
      towerColor - the color of the towers of the player

  • Method Details

    • playAssistantCard

      public void playAssistantCard(AssistantCard which)
      Command for playing a card during the game
      Parameters:
      which - to define which card we need to get from the deck

    • canChangeAssistantCard

      public boolean canChangeAssistantCard()
      Method to know if a player can play another card
      Returns:
      true if he can, false if not

    • giveAssistantCard

      public void giveAssistantCard(AssistantCard card)
      Adds a card to the player's personal card Deck
      Parameters:
      card - card to be added

    • getPersonalDeck

      public List<AssistantCard> getPersonalDeck()
      Getter
      Returns:
      a list of Assistant Cards representing the personal card deck

    • moveStudent

      public void moveStudent(TeacherColor student, String sourceId, String destinationId)
      Command to execute a student movement
      Parameters:
      student - is the Teacher Color of the student to move
      sourceId - is the ID of the place to move the student from
      destinationId - is the ID of the place to move the student to

    • moveStudent

      public void moveStudent(TeacherColor studentA, TeacherColor studentB, String placeId)
      Command to execute an Expert student movement between entrance and a place
      Parameters:
      studentA - color of the student from entrance
      studentB - color of the student from place
      placeId - id of the place.

    • getStudentsManagerById

      Parameters:
      id - is the ID of the desired students manager
      Returns:
      the wanted student manager

      Returns:

    • getTower

      public TowerColor getTower(int howManyTowers) throws InvalidParameterException
      Utility used for the influence count, represents the movement of the tower from the player Dashboard
      Returns:
      the color of the asked tower if the player has towers to place
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - sent when there are no more towers, in a normal play this scenario should be not possible
